object.name: MaskPosition
object.description: This object describes the position on faces where a mask should be placed by default.
object.html_description: This object describes the position on faces where a mask should be placed by default.
object.rst_description: This object describes the position on faces where a mask should be placed by default.

annotations.description: The part of the face relative to which the mask should be placed. One of 'forehead', 'eyes', 'mouth', or 'chin'.
annotations.html_description: The part of the face relative to which the mask should be placed. One of “forehead”, “eyes”, “mouth”, or “chin”.
annotations.rst_description: The part of the face relative to which the mask should be placed. One of 'forehead', 'eyes', 'mouth', or 'chin'.
annotations.name: point

annotations.description: Shift by X-axis measured in widths of the mask scaled to the face size, from left to right. For example, choosing -1.0 will place mask just to the left of the default mask position.
annotations.html_description: Shift by X-axis measured in widths of the mask scaled to the face size, from left to right. For example, choosing -1.0 will place mask just to the left of the default mask position.
annotations.rst_description: Shift by X-axis measured in widths of the mask scaled to the face size, from left to right. For example, choosing -1.0 will place mask just to the left of the default mask position.
annotations.name: x_shift

annotations.description: Shift by Y-axis measured in heights of the mask scaled to the face size, from top to bottom. For example, 1.0 will place the mask just below the default mask position.
annotations.html_description: Shift by Y-axis measured in heights of the mask scaled to the face size, from top to bottom. For example, 1.0 will place the mask just below the default mask position.
annotations.rst_description: Shift by Y-axis measured in heights of the mask scaled to the face size, from top to bottom. For example, 1.0 will place the mask just below the default mask position.
annotations.name: y_shift

annotations.description: Mask scaling coefficient. For example, 2.0 means double size.
annotations.html_description: Mask scaling coefficient. For example, 2.0 means double size.
annotations.rst_description: Mask scaling coefficient. For example, 2.0 means double size.
annotations.name: scale
